I booked this place based on the rating. What I walked into was not what I expected, was far below my expectations, and my 3-night reservation turned into a 1-night stay. The stairs leading to the decking for the entrance to the side door are broken and the decking in the back is spongy in some spots. Overall, the decking is neglected and unsafe in some spots. The floors were not clean, specifically in the kitchen area. The A/C unit and/or the thermostat were broken. It was disturbing to see the thermostat had been modified with a toggle switch on the side, and packing tape was wrapped around the thermostat to keep it somewhat in place. It took more time to wire up the toggle switch and tape it to the thermostat than it would have to purchase and install a new unit. The hot water side of the kitchen faucet was not functioning properly. Slats in the blinds were broken. The toilet seat was loose in the bathroom and there was hair in the sink.
In addition, If you like to sleep in the dark, this place is not a good fit. Directly over the bed is a skylight and a majority of the windows located on the upper part of the walls (which cast light into the bedroom) don't have any type of covering on them. In the late spring/summer this presents a problem since it's light by 6:00 a.m.
On the plus side, once the owners responded to my concerns, they agreed to refund the remainder of my stay. I do hope the owners address the issues that caused me to leave early, it could be a nice place and it's in a good location.
